TopicTitle: Infinite vessel has lost connection popup

Articles.Content:
I screw my automated station by placing the plate antenna so that it is half inside the vessel. On the entering the Eve's orbit a message regarding lost connection started appear at approximately the rate of my FPS.

The noise is disturbing and the popups affect the FPS in a dramatic manner.

The popups remain when I return to the KSC. After the loading safe it persists.

Tech info
KSP: 0.1.2.0

The specs:
Ryzen 7950x, Rtx 4090 64 GB Ram

The popups remain when I return to the KSC. After the loading safe it persists.
